bioghist.p: Isaac Jerome (1786-1866) and his wife Aurora (Murray) Jerome (1785-1867) had ten children. They included sons Allen Murray Jerome (1808-1840), Thomas Atwater Jerome (1810-1896), Addison Gardiner Jerome (1811-1864), and Aaron Brainard Jerome (1813-1829).

scopecontent.p: This small collection consists of correspondence of the Jerome family. A letter to Addison G. Jerome from Allen Jerome, written in October of 1839, discusses the purchase of a stove, family news, the financial situation in Philadelphia and how the economy of Philadelphia compares to that of New York. Letter to Isaac and Aurora Jerome from their sons Allen, Addison, Aaron and Thomas Jerome, written in May of 1836. The letter discusses the school and business activities of the boys. The collection also includes a volume entitled Ancestors and Descendants of Eugene Murray Jerome and Paulina von Schneidau, 1957.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
